description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) can use API hashing and modify the names of strings to evade detection.(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Proofpoint TA416 Europe March 2022)

external_references.description: Lunghi, D. et al. (2020, February). Uncovering DRBControl. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
Raggi, M. et al. (2022, March 7). The Good, the Bad, and the Web Bug: TA416 Increases Operational Tempo Against European Governments as Conflict in Ukraine Escalates. Retrieved March 16, 2022.
